tag_list: consulting, crm, bpm, dcm, km, it, case-management, software, papyrus
overview: Antoine is a senior IT Consultant in ISIS Papyrus software since more than 5 years and focuses on CRM, BPM and Case management implementation for his customers. Prior to that Antoine was involved in large IT in-house software deployment for Insurance companies and large french banks. For that he visited more than 20 different countries for medium and long stay is 4 different continents. He is apparently entering the social arena …
